data.name: Virtue's Heaven
data.detailed_description:
Virtue’s Heaven is an expressive, 2D action adventure. Explore a world that has been stuck in an endless day for as long as anyone can remember, free your friends from prison and gain enough Zeal to end the Age of Reason.

Fight those that claim to own this world, take their hearts and create a future for a world that forgot it had one.

Expressive Movement

Flip through the air, dash past enemy attacks, and jump off of walls to reach distant places. There are almost no limits to what you can do.

Choose Your Own Style

Do you want to have more health? Want to punch projectiles back in your enemies’ faces? Or unlock even more movement options? In Virtue’s Heaven, you decide the way your character gets stronger.

Gather Zeal

Fighting the Bosses of Virtue’s Heaven will increase your Zeal. Zeal will power up your Character and open up new areas for you to explore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (might also work on older versions, but haven't tested those...)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2310M
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
